text: The 15th Orgburo of the All-Union Communist Party (Bolsheviks) was elected by the 1st Plenary Session of the 15th Central Committee, in the immediate aftermath of the 15th Congress. ==Full members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="col" |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration ! scope="col" style="width:30em;" | Note |- ! scope="row" | (1895–1971) | 19 December 1927 | 11 April 1928 | | align="left" | Relieved of his duties at the 1st Joint Plenary Session of the Central Committee and the Central Control Commission. |- ! scope="row" | (1889–1969) | 19 December 1927 | 13 July 1930 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1884–1938) | 19 December 1927 | 13 July 1930 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1888–1937) | 19 December 1927 | 13 July 1930 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1889–1939) | 19 December 1927 | 12 July 1928 | | align="left" | Relieved of his duties at the 2nd Plenary Session. |- ! scope="row" | (1881–1937) | 19 December 1927 | 13 July 1930 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1890–1986) | 19 December 1927 | 13 July 1930 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1890–1937) | 19 December 1927 | 13 July 1930 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1889–1938) | 19 December 1927 | 13 July 1930 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1886–1937) | 19 December 1927 | 29 April 1929 | | align="left" | Relieved of his duties at the 4th Plenary Session. |- ! scope="row" | (1892–1937) | 11 April 1928 | 29 April 1929 | | align="left" | Elected at the 1st Joint Plenary Session of the Central Committee and the Central Control Commission. |- ! scope="row" | (1893–1991) | 12 July 1928 | 13 July 1930 | | align="left" | Elected at the 2nd Plenary Session. |- ! scope="row" | (1894–1937) | 17 November 1929 | 13 July 1930 | | align="left" | Elected at the 6th Plenary Session. |} ==Candidate members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="row" | (1886–1938) | 11 April 1928 | 29 April 1929 | | align="left" | Elected at the 1st Joint Plenary Session of the Central Committee and the Central Control Commission. |- ! scope="row" | (1888–1970) | 17 November 1929 | 13 July 1930 | | align="left" | Elected at the 6th Plenary Session. |} ==References== Category:Members of the Orgburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union
